original_text: When Jacob was come into Egypt, and your fathers cried unto the Lord, then the Lord sent Moses and Aaron, which brought forth your fathers out of Egypt, and made them dwell in this place.
korean_text: 야곱이 애굽에 들어간 후 너희 조상들이 여호와께 부르짖으매 여호와께서 모세와 아론을 보내사 그 두 사람으로 너희 조상들을 애굽에서 인도해 내어 이 곳에 살게 하셨으나

sentences.original_text: When Jacob was come into Egypt
and your fathers cried unto the Lord
then the Lord sent Moses and Aaron
which brought forth your fathers out of Egypt
and made them dwell in this place
